newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexico 1996-1997 sugar harvest update to April 12.
newsitem.headline: Mexico 1996-1997 sugar harvest update to April 12.

text.p: Mexico's Agroindustry Sugar CCommittee weekly harvest update for the 1996-1997 (Nov/June) sugar crop to April 12 (sugar, in tonnes) --
Harvest Cane milled Sugar Output Yield
Harvest Cane milled Sugar Output Yield
The committee reported that during the week 59 of the country's active 61 mills were in operation compared to 60 in the 1995-1996 harvest and 59 in the 1994-1995 harvest.
